value.name: Democrats Rally Around Biden After Special Counsel Report Questions His Fitness
value.description: The vice president led the charge in refuting accusations that Biden has trouble remembering things, dismissing the report as ‘politically motivated.’

value.name: To avoid election crisis, Arizona lawmakers try bipartisanship
value.description: Alarmed that Arizona’s 11 electoral votes might not be counted in the 2024 presidential election, Republicans and Democrats in this political battleground did something rare: They found consensus.

value.name: Pakistan election: Imran Khan and Nawaz Sharif each claim advantage
value.description: Imran Khan posted an AI-generated victory speech on X. The jailed former Pakistani Prime Minister Imran Khan has claimed victory in Thursday's general election and called on his s

value.name: Pakistan election: Rival parties each claim advantage
value.description: The jailed former Pakistani Prime Minister Imran Khan has claimed victory in Thursday's general election and called on his supporters to celebrate. Independent candidates linked to him have won most seats so far, with the majority of seats declared.

value.name: The race for George Santos’ congressional seat could offer clues to how suburbs will vote this year
value.description: The race for George Santos’ congressional seat could offer clues to how suburbs will vote this year - As 2024 election contests ramp up across US, could suburban Long Island offer clues as to how people may vote in November?

video.name: Suozzi and Pilip talk about special election

value.name: Imran Khan posts AI video declaring victory in Pakistani election as candidates backed by his party win most seats despite him being behind bars and communications blackout
value.description: In the message, which is usually delivered by word through his lawyers, the AI version of Imran Khan rejected rival Nawaz Sharif's earlier claim to victory

value.name: The power of Europe’s rebellious farmers
value.description: The extraordinary concessions they won from Brussels this week illustrate their potential to reshape the bloc’s politics

value.name: Could the Democrats replace Joe Biden?
value.description: Nikki Haley, Trump’s Republican rival, has repeatedly attacked Trump and Biden for being too old and mentally unfit for the presidency. But she has so far ruled out an independent bid. “I’m a Republican,” she told The Wall Street Journal this week. “A Republican primary is where Republicans run.”

value.name: Former Obama adviser says special counsel report on Biden amounts to ‘partisan hit job’ – live
value.description: Special counsel report referenced Biden as ‘a sympathetic, well-meaning, elderly man with a poor memory’; Senate debates Israel and Ukraine aid bill

value.name: Pakistan election: Rival parties each claim advantage as count continues
value.description: Welcome to our live coverage of Pakistan’s general election. Results have begun to trickle in after yesterday’s vote. Experts say the counting has been slower compared to previous elections.

value.name: The frightening thing is not that Tories are paraded as more fiscally competent. It’s that even Labour believes it
value.description: Abandoning its £28bn green plan betrays a lack of self-belief that has long bedevilled the party, says Guardian columnist Andy Beckett

value.name: Politics latest news: Labour in fresh green U-turn over windfall tax
value.description: Rachel Reeves insisted she will still be the UK’s “first green chancellor” despite tearing up Labour’s flagship £28 billion investment pledge. Ms Reeves originally made the statement during her speech at Labour Party conference in 2021.

value.name: Pensioners abandon the Tories with just a quarter of over-65s planning to vote Conservative at the next election - down from 60% in 2019 - with a surge in support for Reform ...
value.description: Just 26 per cent of over-65s say they plan to vote for the Tories at the next election, down from an estimated 60 per cent who backed the party under Boris Johnson at the 2019 election.

value.name: Biden tries to lay to rest age concerns, but may have exacerbated them
value.description: A probe that spared President Joe Biden from criminal charges paradoxically dealt him a threatening political blow.

value.name: Imran Khan’s party on course for stunning Pakistan election victory as its independents lead count
value.description: Contentious results are almost certain to be contested, analysts say, after lengthy delays in the count and amid uncertainty over fate of PTI and its jailed leader

value.name: Can Labour win the next general election?
value.description: Their biggest strength is not being the Conservatives — but whether the superiority the party enjoys can be sustained over months of scrutiny is the question

value.name: Rod Stewart blasts ‘lying public schoolboy’ Boris Johnson and says Labour should win next election
value.description: Long-time Tory Rod Stewart has thrown his weight behind Labour’s Keir Starmer ahead of a general election this year. The British rocker, 79, slammed “lying f***ing public schoolboy” Boris Johnson and called for the Conservatives to be booted out of No10 following a string of unelected prime ministers.

value.name: Top White House Officials Meet With Arab And Muslim Leaders To Reconcile
value.description: State Rep. Abraham Aiyash, the majority floor leader and the second-ranking Democrat in Michigan; Abdullah Hammoud, the mayor of Dearborn; and Assad Turfe, the deputy county executive of Wayne County, were among those who attended the meeting.

value.name: It may be too late to stop the great election disinformation campaigns of 2024 but we have to at least try
value.description: With an unprecedented number of votes happening around the world, the information environment will be chaotic, to say the least.

value.name: US election: Donald Trump wins huge victory in Nevada caucus
value.description: Former President Donald Trump has won the Nevada Republican caucus by a large margin. The only other person whose name was on the ballot was Ryan Binkley, a pastor and businessman. It means Mr Trump will take all Nevada's 26 delegates, the system used by the parties to determine their presidential candidate.

value.name: Trump flexes his dominance of Nevada GOP but cracks are forming in this crucial battleground
value.description: Varlin Higbee traveled more than two hours from his Lincoln County, Nevada, home to see Donald Trump in person last month, but when he arrived at the former president’s Las Vegas rally, he was stopped at the door.

value.name: How will the UK and US elections this year impact investments?
